name: Tirta Susilo
body:
Tirta is a [lecturer](http://www.victoria.ac.nz/psyc/about/staff/tirta-susilo) in the School of Psychology at Victoria University of Wellington. He is a member of the Cognitive and Behavioural Neuroscience (CBNS) group. As an undergraduate Tirta studied industrial engineering at [Parahyangan University](http://ti.unpar.ac.id/) and psychology at the [University of Queensland](http://www.psy.uq.edu.au/). He received his PhD in cognitive psychology from the [Australian National University](http://psychology.anu.edu.au/) and was a postdoctoral associate in cognitive neuroscience at [Dartmouth College](http://pbs.dartmouth.edu/). Tirta is originally from Jakarta, Indonesia.

# Contact

Tirta Susilo  
Easterfield 511  
School of Psychology  
Victoria University of Wellington
